title: OT ... Font Manager
content:
Would you recommend Typegraf font manager? Are you familiar with The Font Thing (manager)?  
Thanks!

author: link

comments.content: i think the biggest drawback to “The Font Thing” is that it only handles [TrueType](http://web.archive.org/web/20071104142458/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/TrueType) fonts — no [PostScript](http://web.archive.org/web/20071104142458/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/PostScript).

link, do you mean “typograf” ( [http://neuber.com/typograph/index.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20071104142458/http:/neuber.com/typograph/index.html "http://neuber.com/typograph/index.html"))? As far as I remember it’s possible to test it for 30 days or so.  
On a pc you could also consider ATM or a combination of both (there’s a link at the bottom of the page).
